story.text: A [[Gnu General Public License]] toolkit for creating applications that use the Microsoft Messaging [[Application Programming Interface]].
The toolkit and other resources are available at [http://www.sourcextreme.com/resources.html www.sourcextreme.com]
The code started out as part of a project to build an [[Open Source]] MAPI transport and MAPI message store. The code has evolved, predominantly using [[Test Driven Development]].

This toolkit is [[Free Software]] and [[Open Source]]. It was originally authored by [[Jason Nocks]] and is provided by [[Source Xtreme]], Inc. Commercial support is also available. Contact mailto:info@sourcextreme.com. Or, visit [http://www.sourcextreme.com/ www.sourcextreme.com] for more information about [[Source Xtreme]].
